




== Ideas for a new netbook ==
  - Budget: $400
  - Expected Specs:
    a) 10.1" display
    b) USB 3.0 Port(s)
    c) HDMI out
    d) GPU with Linux Support
    e) x64 architecture
    f) At least 4GB RAM
  - Not really necessary, would be nice though:
    g) 2.5" drive (or at least 64GB eMMC)
    h) SD card
    i) Ethernet Port
    j) external battery
    k) upgradeable RAM

  - Candidates:
    * Lenovo Flex 10: <$350(depends on the model, seems difficult to find)
      + : a,b(1),c,d(Celeron n2807,n2840),e,f*
      + : g
      * It comes with soldered RAM, so you need to pick the right model.
      - : no sd card, no ethernet port, internal battery and soldered RAM.
    * Lenovo E10-30:
      + : a,b,c,d,e,f*
      + : g,i
      - : NO HDMI, no sd card, internal battery and solderen RAM.
    * lenovo ideapad Miix 300: atom z3735f 64G,2GB RAM
